item.title: New Donald Duck: Happy Camper Board Game Celebrates Character's 90th Anniversary
item.content:encoded:
https://techraptor.net/tabletop/news/new-donald-duck-happy-camper-board-game-celebrates-characters-90th-anniversary

Diehard Disney fans have a new collectible to hunt down. In celebration of Donald Duck's 90th anniversary, The Walt Disney Company and Maestro Media have announced the Donald Duck: Happy Camper board game is now available.

The Donald Duck: Happy Camper Announcement

According to an official press release Donald Duck: Happy Camper is a board game that is both fun and accessible for players of all ages. Two to four players can complete a game in 30-45 minutes, making it perfect fit for family game nights.

The game in question is exactly what it looks like on the box. Players are on a camping trip with Donald, Webby, Huey, Dewie, and Louie. Players will explore the wilderness, set up camp, take scenic photos, and earn Junior Woodchuck badges. All of these activities earn points, however you get bonus points for doing them first. Race among your friends to get the most out of your camping trip.

Donald Duck: Happy Camper was designed by Wolfgang Kramer and Daryl Andrews. Kramer is the five-time winner of the Spiel des Jahres and the lead designer of El Grande. Andrews won the 2022 Game Innovator of the Year award and was the designer of Sagrada.

The game marks the first collaboration between the Walt Disney Company and Maestro Media. Maestro was founded in 2015 known for adapting various properties into tabletop games and merchandise. Their past works include Binding of Isaac: Four Souls, Hello Kitty, and The Smurfs: Hidden Village.

“We are honored to work with Disney on this special project celebrating Donald Duck’s 90th anniversary and we’ve been working hard behind the scenes to create a game that captures the fun and magic of Disney!” said Javon Frazier, Founder and CEO of Maestro Media. “Grab your family and friends for a camping experience full of laughs, surprises, and a whole lot of quacking!”

Donald Duck: Happy Camper is available for purchase now on Maestro's website. It is currently being sold at an MSRP of $39.99.

Ever since he was small, Tyler Chancey has had a deep, abiding love for video games and a tendency to think and overanalyze everything he enjoyed. This… More about Tyler
